h2_title: How to Find The Great Sage's Broken Shell
h1_content: The Great Sage's Broken Shell is one of the main and final bosses you'll fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You'll jump into this fight as soon as you finish against The Stone Monkey, and it's the final one needed to see the ending of the game.
h2_content: You'll start this fight as soon as you finish the one against The Stone Monkey.
